learning_programs.title: Intro to TinkerHub
learning_programs.description: The main agenda of this program was to give a basic idea about TinkerHub and our future plans

learning_programs.title: Build From Home Experience Sharing
learning_programs.description: BFH changed us a lot. It changed the way we look at tech. The experience shared by all the members participated in the program was an eye opener to all beginners out there.

learning_programs.title: Git/GitHub Workshop
learning_programs.description: From this workshop we aimed to give a brief idea on what Git and GitHub is and how it works

learning_programs.title: WIT Orientation Program)
learning_programs.description: Women In Tech aka WIT is a girls only platform which recently conducted a program in collaboration with TinkerHub KMEA. The main objective for this event was to make aware of every girls in our community what WIT is and make them aware of the ocean of opportunities in tech especially for girls

learning_programs.title: Intro to mon.school
learning_programs.description: A small event to introduce mon.school platform to our community, also to give an introduction to the course Joy of programming and a bridge for TinkerHub's code-a-pookkalam event

learning_programs.title: Intro to JAVA OOP
learning_programs.description: This event mainly focuses on giving a basic idea on Java OOPS concepts

learning_programs.title: Project Orientation
learning_programs.description: This is an orientation session for students who are going to do their project. This session aims to give a proper idea on what technologies they can use for their project

learning_programs.title: Introduction to Linkedin
learning_programs.description: The idea of this session was to give a basic idea about LinkedIn and how it will be useful for our career. This session was handled by Kavya P (Outreach Co-Lead, TinkerHub FC)

learning_programs.title: thEssentials
learning_programs.description: Essentials is a series of programs to familiarize our fellow tinkerers on front-end web development

learning_programs.title: Learn Together 2021
learning_programs.description: Tinkerhub FC is back with yet another event but with a twist. LEARN TOGETHER is that perfect opportunity you all have been waiting for.

learning_programs.title: Git/GitHub Workshop 2.0
learning_programs.description: This workshop handled by Rijfas aimed to give a brief idea on what Git and GitHub is and how it works.

learning_programs.title: Digital Suite - Workshop on 10 incredible digital tools
learning_programs.description: Workshop on 10 incredible free digital tools that makes our tasks easy.The main aim was to improve digtal skills.

bootcamps.title: Python KickStart
bootcamps.description: Python Kickstart was our first major series conducted. Main agenda of this program was to introduce python programming for absolute beginners This program lasted for about 1 month.

bootcamps.title: C Programming revision
bootcamps.description: A series to get familiar in C programming for bio students, hands on live sessions completed with 20+ hours

bootcamps.title: Introduction to UI/UX
bootcamps.description: This session is mainly intended to give a breif idea on the UI/UX and also to introduce the members of our community to the imperceptible possibilities in the UI/UX field. This session was handled by Finu Muhammed Shaheem (KMCT Campus Lead | Microsoft student ambassador)

bootcamps.title: Essentials - Getting Started || ES-00
bootcamps.description: Essentials is a series of programs to familiarize our fellow tinkerers on front-end web development. This session was a stepping stone for the upcoming sessions. Today we started off by giving a basic idea on web development and its components.

bootcamps.title: Essentials - Introduction To HTML || ES-01
bootcamps.description: Essentials is a series of programs to familiarize our fellow tinkerers on front-end web development. The aim of today's session was to give an introduction to HTML.

bootcamps.title: Essentials - Introduction To CSS || ES-05
bootcamps.description: Essentials is a series of programs to familiarize our fellow tinkerers on front-end web development. The aim of today's session was to give an introduction to CSS.

bootcamps.title: Essentials - Introduction To JS || ES-09
bootcamps.description: Essentials is a series of programs to familiarize our fellow tinkerers on front-end web development. The aim of today's session was to give an introduction to JS.

bootcamps.title: Python Kickstart 2.0
bootcamps.description: Python Kickstart 2.0 is a learning event conducted to introduce python programming for absolute beginners. Guided by Amjad and 3 other mentors Live sessions are handled by Rijfas.

bootcamps.title: Knock to NodeJS
bootcamps.description: This event was conducted for the purpose of familiarising our fellow tinkerers the backend development through nodeJS

bootcamps.title: Webex
bootcamps.description: A complete beginner friendly workshop conducted by WIT to get started with html css. The sessions were handled by Shada Fathima. Participants built a simple portfolio by the end of the event.

community_events.title: Clueminati
community_events.description: Clueminati was a virtual treasure hunt conducted mainly to get to know each other.

community_events.title: Community Connect #1
community_events.description: Community Connect #1 was one of the major program conducted inside our community. We wanted to introduce what TinkerHub is ,how Discord works and a small talk about campus council.

community_events.title: Tech Tips E01
community_events.description: Tech Tips is discord series where small tech podikkaikal is introduced. E01 was conducted by Rijfas. He introduced us to some small tips and tricks which will make our lives more easier while using VS Code.

community_events.title: Tech Tips E02
community_events.description: E02 was conducted by Adil Ayyoob. Some simple tips and tricks which will make our smartphone usage much easier.

community_events.title: Community Connect #2
community_events.description: Community Connect #2 was one of the major program conducted inside our community. We wanted to introduce what TinkerHub is ,how Discord works and a small talk about campus council.

community_events.title: Official Inaugration
community_events.description: It's with great happiness we invite everyone to our inaugural ceremony INCEPTION'21 on 9/12/21 at 2.00 pm in AVT hall

community_events.title: Community Connect #3
community_events.description: Community Connect #3 was conducted to introduce what TinkerHub is, how Discord works and a small game session to introduce TinkerHub for new members.

community_events.title: WomenInTech - Orientation 2.0
community_events.description: This event was conducted by WIT to make girls aware why Women in tech exists and to connect with the new members.

community_events.title: Teaching yourself how to code
community_events.description: A casual talk handled by Rijfas and Amjad on how coding works and the stages a programmer pass through.

community_events.title: Community Connect #4
community_events.description: Community Connect #4 was conducted to introduce what TinkerHub is, how Discord works and a small game session.Main aim is to build connection between the community members.

achievements.title: Code-A-Pookalam
achievements.description: Code-A-Pookalam is an upcoming event in TinkerHub in collaboration with Mon School. Mon School is a not-for-profit online platform for learning programming. More details of the program is yet to come. But the idea is we need to code and create a pookalam using the Joy library created by Mon School.

achievements.title: Saturday Hack Night #1 Dialogueflow API
achievements.description: Saturday Hack Night is a program conducted on the 1st and 3rd Saturdays of the month in our main TinkerHub discord server

achievements.title: Build From Home
achievements.description: Build From Home aka BFH was the very first program that we participated in TinkerHub Community. It longed for about 10 days. 5 teams participated from our community and 4 projects was accepted.

achievements.title: Saturday Hack Night #2
achievements.description: Saturday Hack Night is a program conducted on the 1st and 3rd Saturdays of the month in our main TinkerHub discord server

achievements.title: Cocoder
achievements.description: Cocoder was an event organised by TinkerHub. A team of 2 members built cool stuffs together.

achievements.title: Saturday Hack Night #3 - Notion API
achievements.description: Saturday Hack Night is a program conducted on the 1st and 3rd Saturdays of the month in our main TinkerHub discord server

achievements.title: Saturday Hack Night #4 - Gmail API
achievements.description: Saturday Hack Night is a program conducted on the 1st and 3rd Saturdays of the month in our main TinkerHub discord server
